recommended_actions.description: R session s1408 failed note quality check — no R# marker, no commits, diagnostic note only. Post-fix rate 67% (2/3). Existing 15-r-commit-gate.sh only catches sessions that make commits. Zero-output R sessions bypass the gate. Need a post-session hook that detects R sessions with empty or non-conforming notes.
recommended_actions.action: Create wq item to extend R session note quality gate to catch zero-output sessions.
